name: Royalevia
description:
Royalevia is an action arcade game with RPG elements.
The game takes place in a dark and creepy forest, where the player assumes the role of a dark knight
who must navigate through treacherous terrain and fight hordes of undead who have risen from the dead.
The knight is armed with a huge sword that can be used to effectively clear locations.
As the game progresses, the knight will face more dangerous enemies, which require strategic thinking and skillful combat to defeat.
The goal of the game: you need to live as many waves as possible and set a record.

Features:

- Gloomy atmosphere.
- Enemies progress with you.
- Addictive gameplay.
